channel.title: [FoL] Experimental Forum of Lies 2 ReDux - Unseen, Warlock, and Scorned win!
channel.description:
## Welcome to Experimental Forum of Lies 2!
### [Polls at the end of the game! Please answer them!](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fol-experimental-forum-of-lies-2-redux-day-6-6-16-unseen-warlock-and-scorned-win/75485/4896)
<small>We're doing it again because the first one was canned.</small>
<small>Hosted by @Geyde and @Solic</small>
### Rules
![|20x20](https://forum.imperium42.com/user_avatar/forum.imperium42.com/queen_alfa/40/6988_2.png) [Forum of Lies Official Hub](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/forum-of-lies-official-hub/1515) [Forum of Lies](https://forum.imperium42.com/c/forum-matches/forum-of-lies)
> Welcome to the wonderful wacky (And sometimes stressful) world of FoL! Useful Links [Class Cards Thread!](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fol-class-cards-clean-with-no-talking/1998) [Spreadsheet of Complete, Ongoing and Planned FoL and SFoL games! Also includes information on how to sign up to host.](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1eAoQS7saD6SL-s9v0Z6A5Fthb_XrraZt_IvBuslsoBs/edit?usp=sharing) [The Forum of Lies Discord Server!](https://discord.gg/YU7aVWd) [A friendly “how to get started” guide by one of our own players! ](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/forum-of-lies-getting-started/49368)[New player guide by our good boy](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/forum-of-lies-new-player-guide/71790) General Gameplay Infomation Rules Follow the Global Forum Rules If you haven’t posted content in 36 hours, you’ll be prodded for inactiv…
### Gameplay
Days will be 2 IRL days long, or shorter if someone dies Nights will be 1 IRL day long Actions are done by messaging me Unseen/Cult will talk through a special Discord server Priest will speak with the dead through a separate Discord server All classes will be used, and will be used as they are found in the [Class Cards Thread](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fol-class-cards-now-officially-official/1998/) When you receive a card you will have 24 hours to reply, confirming you have received it
### Executions
To accuse someone say “ **/accuse [player]** ” or “ **/vote [player]** ” Once majority is reached to accuse someone, that player will die. There will be no trials. Executions end the Day
# Special Experimental Changes
1. Trials have been removed. 2. Noble has been reworked. 3. The Kings have all been reworked. 4. Mastermind has been updated.
All class cards that have had minor interactions changed are not noted here. Any denotations of voting for execution instead refer to accusations due to the removal of trials.
[details="New Noble, Aristocrat, Apostle"]
New Noble Class Card > # **[color=solblue]The Noble[/color]** > > > > **Blue Dragon Social** > **Royal Blood (Passive)** - Votes to become king count as two for you. > **Pull Rank (Passive)** - When voting another player to become king, your votes are worth double. Does not work when voting for yourself. > **Gossip (Night)** - Target a player and learn if any and which of these things happens to them tonight. - Infinite Uses > > > > ***They were successfully Investigated.*** > ***They were successfully Occupied.*** > ***Their target was successfully swapped.*** > > > > **Bounty (Night)** - If target player is executed tomorrow and is Blue Dragon then there will be an additional execution. Only one Bounty may take effect per day. You cannot target King. - 2 uses > *Your objective is to defeat the Unseen or Cult, and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.*
> **Converts into [color=purple]The Aristocrat[/color] or [color=darkred]The Apostle[/color]** > **Cult points: 2 - Each Ability Costs: 1**
New Aristocrat Class Card > # [color=purple]The Aristocrat[/color] > > > > **Unseen Social** > **Royal Blood (Passive)** - Votes to become king count as two for you. > **Pull Rank (Passive)** - When voting another player to become king, your votes are worth double. Does not work when voting for yourself. > **Incriminate (Day)** - Slip a player forged documents, making them appear evil to investigations tonight. - Infinite uses > **Gossip (Night)** - Target a player and learn if any and which of these things happens to them tonight. - Infinite Uses > > > > ***They were successfully Investigated.*** > ***They were successfully Occupied.*** > ***Their target was successfully swapped.*** > > > > **Bounty (Night)** - If target player is executed tomorrow and is Blue Dragon then there will be an additional execution. Only one Bounty may take effect per day. You cannot target King. - 2 uses > *Your objective is to defeat the Blue Dragon and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.*
New Apostle Class Card > # [color=darkred]The Apostle[/color] :crossed_swords: > > > > **Cult Social** > **Dark Words (Passive)** - While you live, living and dead Cult members can communicate at night. > **Eminence of Mithras (Day)** - At the end of the day, you will learn who voted for whom during today’s king election. - 2 uses > *Your objective is to defeat the Blue Dragon and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.*
[/details]
[details="Kings"] > # [color=solblue]The Good King[/color] :shield: :crossed_swords: > > > > **Blue Dragon Special** > **Pass The Torch (Passive)** - If you die, there will be a vote held to crown the next King. If you are executed for treason all players will lose their Royal Blood passive permanently. > **Head of State (Passive)** - Your vote counts as two. This passive is disabled while there are 4 or less players alive. > **Royal Pardon (Day)** - Make a player unable to be voted today. This will be publicly announced. - 1 use, shared with Royal Execution > **Royal Execution (Day)** -Target a player. That player will require 2 less votes to reach majority today. This will be publicly announced. - 1 use, shared with Royal Pardon > **Guard! (Night)** - Choose a player. They will be immune to death tonight. - 4 uses > **Swear Fealty (Night)** - Make a player permanently immune to conversion. - 1 use (Starting King Only.) > *Your objective is to defeat the Unseen or Cult, and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.*
> # [color=purple]**The Evil King**[/color] :shield: :crossed_swords: > > > > **Unseen Special** > **Pass The Torch (Passive)** - If you die, there will be a vote held to crown the next King. > **Head of State (Passive)** - Your vote counts as two. This passive is disabled while there are 4 or less players alive. > **Royal Pardon (Day)** - Make a player unable to be voted today. This will be publicly announced. - 1 use, shared with Royal Execution > **Royal Execution (Day)** -Target a player. That player will require 2 less votes to reach majority today. This will be publicly announced. - 1 use, shared with Royal Pardon > **Guard! (Night)** - Choose a player. They will be immune to death tonight. - 3 uses > **Scheme (Night)** - Make the target player night immune and look not suspicious to The Sheriff tonight. - 2 uses (Starting King only) > *Your objective is to defeat the Blue Dragon and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.*
> # [color=darkred]**The Devout King**[/color] :shield: :crossed_swords: > > > > **Cult Special** > **Pass The Torch (Passive)** - If you die, there will be a vote held to crown the next King. > **Head of State (Passive)** - Your vote counts as two. This passive is disabled while there are 4 or less players alive. > **Royal Pardon (Day)** - Make a player unable to be voted today. This will be publicly announced. - 1 use, shared with Royal Execution > **Royal Execution (Day)** -Target a player. That player will require 2 less votes to reach majority today. This will be publicly announced. - 1 use, shared with Royal Pardon > **Guard! (Night)** - Choose a player. They will be immune to death tonight. - 3 uses > **Dark Gods Crown (Night)** - Select a dead Cultist and a living player. Depending on the Cultist’s class a different effect will occur. Each corpse can only be used once. > *Your objective is to defeat the Blue Dragon and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.*
> **Dark Gods Crown Effects:** > Seeker - You learn of the players class type. > Ritualist - You will prevent visits to the player. > Invoker - The player will be occupied. > Apostle - The player will be given incorrect feedback for their ability tonight. > Cult Leader - The player will be framed. > Devout King - Receive an extra Royal Pardon/Execution.
(All Neutral Kings remain the same, just replace their Head of State / Decide Fate / Royal Pardon with the above Head of State / Royal Execution / Royal Pardon)
[/details]
[details="New Mastermind"]
> # [color=purple]**The Mastermind**[/color] :shield: :crossed_swords: > > > > **Unseen Special** > **Can’t Touch This (Passive)** - Immune to death at night, occupation and target changing. Occupations and target changes on you will appear successful and You will know if someone tries to occupy you or change your target. > **Lurking Presence (Passive)** - You will appear to be a Blue Dragon Investigative class to investigations for the first 3 nights. When you die, the Starting Assassin will take your place if they are still alive. > **Dirty Work (Day)** If there are no more Unseen members left, you can become The Assassin at the beginning of the night. - Infinite Uses > **Convert (Night)** - Change target player into the Unseen version of their class. If you have failed to convert a target twice already and your next conversion would fail it will instead target a random convertible player. - Infinite uses, 1 night cooldown > **Foresight (Night)** - Determine a player’s converted class type, or if they cannot be converted. - 4 uses > *Your objective is to defeat the Blue Dragon and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.*
[/details]
### Journals
Message me your entire journal, the last draft I receive before you die shall be the one displayed
### To Join
To join, simply express interest in joining by saying something like “I want to join” or “/join” or “/in” or “sign me up, coach” or whatever you want
# Players:
1. ~~Meteoro~~ [**Lynched D5** - ](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fol-experimental-forum-of-lies-2-redux-day-5-11-16-another-resurrection/75485/4810)[color=purple]**The Assassin**[/color] 2. Simon - **[color=solblue]The Princess[/color]** 3. WazzaAzza [**Died N3, then Revived N4 -**](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/experimental-forum-of-lies-2-redux-day-3-14-16-return-of-the-prince/75485/3684) [color=solblue]**The Physician**[/color] - [color=purple]**Shadow Puppet**[/color] 4. Sam17z - **[color=purple]The Mastermind[/color]** 5. ~~Margaret~~ **Died N5 -** [color=solblue]**The Drunk**[/color] 6. ~~Priestess~~ [**Lynched D2, then Revived N2, then Lynched again D4-**](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/experimental-forum-of-lies-2-redux-night-2-14-16-the-fall-of-the-heir/75485/2605) [color=solblue]**The Prince**[/color] 7. ~~MaximusPrime~~ [**Died N3 -**](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/experimental-forum-of-lies-2-redux-day-3-14-16-return-of-the-prince/75485/3684) [color=solblue]**The Sheriff**[/color] 8. ~~Maxwell~~ [**Died N2 -**](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/experimental-forum-of-lies-2-redux-day-3-14-16-return-of-the-prince/75485/2612) [color=solblue]**The Observer**[/color] - [color=slateblue]Phylactery Holder![/color] 9. ~~Insanity~~ [**Lynched D3 -**](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/experimental-forum-of-lies-2-redux-day-2-15-16-a-brutal-sight/75485/3680) [color=purple]**The Mastermind**[/color] 10. PoisonedSquid - **[color=red]The Scorned[/color]** 11. ~~GamerPoke~~ **Died N5 -** [color=slateblue]**The Lich**[/color] 12. ~~Boss~~ [**Died N1 -**](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/experimental-forum-of-lies-2-redux-day-2-15-16-a-brutal-sight/75485/183) [color=solblue]**The Knight**[/color] 13. Isaac_Gonzalez - **[color=turquoise]The Warlock[/color]** 14. Hippolytus - **[color=purple]The Evil King[/color]** 15. ~~Frostwolf103~~ **Died N5 -** [color=purple]**Assassin**[/color] 16. H_Hjasik - **[color=solblue]The Noble[/color]** - [color=slateblue]Phylactery Holder![/color]
### Backups
--
## Thread Summary
[Start of Day 1](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/experimental-forum-of-lies-2-redux-16-16-all-hail-king-hippolytus/75485/58) [Start of Night 1](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/experimental-forum-of-lies-2-redux-n1-16-16-a-horrible-night-to-have-a-curse/75485/178) [Start of Day 2](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/experimental-forum-of-lies-2-redux-day-2-15-16-a-brutal-sight/75485/183) [The Mëmë Rises | Post 1427](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/experimental-forum-of-lies-2-redux-day-2-15-16-a-brutal-sight/75485/1427) [Day 2 Lynch: Prince!](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/experimental-forum-of-lies-2-redux-night-2-14-16-the-fall-of-the-heir/75485/2605) [Start of Day 3: Dead Men Walking](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/experimental-forum-of-lies-2-redux-day-3-14-16-return-of-the-prince/75485/2612) [Day 3 Lynch: The One Behind it All!](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/experimental-forum-of-lies-2-redux-night-3-13-16-the-mastermind-falls/75485/3683) [Start of Day 4: Two Bodies Drop!](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/experimental-forum-of-lies-2-redux-day-3-14-16-return-of-the-prince/75485/3684) [Day 4 Lynch: Prince Again!](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/experimental-forum-of-lies-2-redux-day-3-14-16-return-of-the-prince/75485/4091)

item.title: [FoL] Experimental Forum of Lies 2 ReDux - Unseen, Warlock, and Scorned win!
item.dc:creator: Emilia
item.description:
Solic:

Wagons for ideas exist too

That would work much less effective because of inactivity + ppl not taking it seriously and already settling on lynch
Also jail == lynch it doesn’t hurt as much so isn’t as good info provider as lynch

Solic:

Except a mislynch is more costly than a townie spending a night in jail.

There is chance to lynch scum too it’s like playing game and trading day lynch for jail

Solic:

She is more indebted than literally being against town in her win condition. Town generally still dictates lynches early game, so she’d be more inclined to be for them. She vocalized this in her classcard too.

I can’t know what she says in classcard also town has majority in any case at early stages and it much depends on her reads how she votes not to say that she is not motivated to gamesolve by wincon or doesn’t even have to side with us 100%

Read full topic
item.source: [FoL] Experimental Forum of Lies 2 ReDux - Unseen, Warlock, and Scorned win!

item.title: [FoL] Experimental Forum of Lies 2 ReDux - Unseen, Warlock, and Scorned win!
item.dc:creator: Solic
item.description:
Emilia:

Can’t have info from wagons if ones don’t exist

Wagons for ideas exist too.

Emilia:

And lynch kills so it also gets rid of KPN that’s like saying that instead of day lynches you would rather have prince on your side

Except a mislynch is more costly than a townie spending a night in jail.

Emilia:

She is not indebted she would most likely side with NK because neuts also there may have been scum on met wagon so she would be also indebted to them by your logic

She is more indebted than literally being against town in her win condition. Town generally still dictates lynches early game, so she’d be more inclined to be for them. She vocalized this in her classcard too.

Read full topic
item.source: [FoL] Experimental Forum of Lies 2 ReDux - Unseen, Warlock, and Scorned win!

item.title: [FoL] Experimental Forum of Lies 2 ReDux - Unseen, Warlock, and Scorned win!
item.dc:creator: Emilia
item.description:
Solic:

Yes, it does,

Can’t have info from wagons if ones don’t exist

Solic:

Jailing also occupies and gets rid of KPN if you don’t jail the convert.

And lynch kills so it also gets rid of KPN that’s like saying that instead of day lynches you would rather have prince on your side

Solic:

Plus Squid would be indebted to you instead of literally being forced to go after someone that is still town.

She is not indebted she would most likely side with NK because neuts also there may have been scum on met wagon so she would be also indebted to them by your logic

Read full topic
item.source: [FoL] Experimental Forum of Lies 2 ReDux - Unseen, Warlock, and Scorned win!
